title: Set up your wallet
description: Once youâ€™ve set up your wallet of choice, connect it to  by clicking the wallet icon in the top right corner.Learn about the wallets we support.

title: Create your collection
description: Click My Collections and set up your collection. Add social links, a description, profile & banner images,and set a secondary sales fee.

title: Add your NFTs
description: Upload your work (image, video, audio,or 3D art), add a title and description, and customize your NFTs with properties, stats.

title: List them for sale
description: Choose between auctions, fixed-price listings, and declining-price listings. You choose how you want to sell your NFTs, and we help you sell them!
